description:
Comfort and stability for tough training and sweaty fitness sessions. The Flite XT blends compression, cushioned support and Flex Channels to manage sweat and keep your feet dry.

  • Fabric manages moisture to keep your feet cool and comfortable
  • Moderate compression support keeps feet going mile after mile
  • AnkleLock™ technology and GripDry™ fibres hold sock securely in place
  • Seamless toe for chafe-free wear
  • Medium cushioning adds comfort underfoot
name: Swiftwick Flite XT Five Running Socks - Unisex
